alert.note: Alert for Apple and Lucerne Valleys; Riverside County Mountains; San Bernardino County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued July 31 at 2:01AM PDT until August 03 at 5:00PM PDT by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM TO 10 PM TODAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by heavy rain from afternoon and evening thunderstorms. * WHERE...The San Bernardino and Riverside County Mountains, and the Apple and Lucerne Valleys. * WHEN...From 10 AM to 10 PM today. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in road flooding and low-lying, flood-prone locations. Mud and rockslides are possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Thunderstorms with heavy rain will form over the Mountains and High Deserts again this afternoon. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Monitor radar.

area.areaDesc: Apple and Lucerne Valleys; Riverside County Mountains; San Bernardino County Mountains
